0.9-yaml-description: In this article you'll learn how to adjust the Shimano Nexus 8 gear hub in 3 easy steps. With video. No tools required. Why is this even important: The Shimano Nexus 8 is a great gear shifter – but only if it is precisely adjusted.
1-paragraph: In this article you will learn how to adjust the popular Shimano Nexus 8 gear shifter yourself <g-1>in just 3 easy steps</g>.
2-paragraph: Why is this even important: The Shimano Nexus 8 is a great gear shifter – but only if it is precisely adjusted.
3-paragraph: The good news is: anyone can do it
5-heading: Why is the Schimano Nexus 8 so popular?
6-paragraph: This 8-speed gear hub from Shimano's Nexus series C6000 is insanely popular. The reasons are obvious:
7.1-list: lasts forever when correctly maintained (1x per year/2000 km)
7.2-list: comparatively large range for such a small hub: 307 %
8-paragraph: The Shimano Nexus 8 is versatile. It's mainly used for cycling in the city. It is also suitable for eBikes with a higher chain tension. So all perfect, right? Exactly. As long as you pay attention to 2 things:
9-paragraph: 👍 Do not switch gears under load!
10-paragraph: 👍 The gear shifter needs to be precisely adjusted!
14-paragraph: The gear shifter needs to be in the 4th gear.
15-paragraph: 👉 Start by switching into the 1st gear and then switch up gear by gear to the 4th.
16-paragraph: If you end up in gear 5 by accident, switch back to 1 and switch up slower.
19-paragraph: 👉 Find the 2 yellow marks on the gear hub.
20-paragraph: They are difficult to see due to oil and dirt. Use a clean rag to clean the gear hub next to the chain.
23-paragraph: 👉 Align the 2 yellow marks by turning the knob on the gear cable.
24-paragraph: In the following picture you'll see the knob on the gear cable that you need to turn.
26-paragraph: This is how the marks look, when they are not aligned yet. You need to turn further.
28-paragraph: This is how the marks are supposed to look like when properly aligned.
30-paragraph: That's it. If you keep your Shimano Nexus 8 nicely adjusted and don't switch gears under load, you will enjoy this reliable and versatile quality gear hub for many years.
